headline: Verizon Communications Inc. (VZ) Declared Quarterly Dividend
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. On June 6, Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.6775 per share, which was in line with its previous dividend. While the company didn’t raise its dividend this time around, it has maintained a consistent track record, increasing […]

headline: Forever Dividend Stocks: 5 Income Stocks I Plan to Never Sell
summary: Brookfield Infrastructure and Brookfield Renewable plan to increase their dividends by 5% to 9% each year.  Realty Income has raised its dividend 130 times since coming public 30 years ago.  Enterprise Products Partners has increased its distribution for 26 straight years.

headline: Should You Buy the 3 Highest-Paying Dividend Stocks in the Dow Jones?
summary: Chevron continues to reward shareholders with great dividends and hefty stock buybacks.  Merck has a high dividend yield and the world's top-selling drug.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) is loaded with blue chip stocks.

headline: Verizon (VZ): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q1 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Verizon has been a great trade. While the S&P 500 was flat, the stock price has climbed by 5.4% to $44.25 per share. This performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
